zorba:iterator.name: FunctionTraceIterator
zorba:iterator.zorba:description: This is just a dummy iterator, which calls its children. This iterator is used to wrap inlined expressions to be able to add the call to the call stack in case of an exception.

zorba:member.name: theFunctionName
zorba:member.brief: stores the name of the function it substitutes

zorba:member.name: theFunctionLocation
zorba:member.brief: stores the location of the function which it calls
